page.title: 11THE FORUM _ WALLSEND
page.content: The main{shopping centre}in Wallsend is situated in the Forum so called after the Romans.One side forms part of the High Street.Most commodities can be obtained in the precinct.Furniture can be bought from the Co_op departmental store and another.The electricity and gas companies have premises there.Food,bakers,butchers,chemists,fr uit and vegetable, shoes and clothes shops are situated there as well as a large{supermarket.Banking}facilities are available and a{medical centre} forms the base from which 7 doctors practise.An interesting feature of the Forum is a statue of a Roman market trader.This is situated in Segedunum Way.
